snippet.title: Evercade - NEOGEO Arcade 1 - Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore one of the greatest arcade systems of all time with this collection of NEOGEO hits for Evercade. Includes METAL SLUG, THE KING OF FIGHTERS 2000, SHOCK TROOPERS, MAGICIAN LORD, SENGOKU and IRONCLAD.

This physical cartridge collection comes with a full-colour manual and is compatible with all Evercade and Super Pocket systems.

£19.99, $24.99, €24.99
Pre-order from May 1st, 2025
Release: July 2025

Find out more: https://evercade.co.uk/cartridges/neogeo-arcade-1/
Evercade: https://evercade.co.uk
